articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: IFA 2023: the biggest announcements from Europe's big tech show - The Verge
articles.description: IFA, Europe’s big tech show, is the place to be to see all the year’s big smart home announcements. Expect robot vacuum cleaners, smart lights, and smart locks.
articles.content: CES may rule the roost in the States, but over in Europe, its IFA that serves as the years biggest tech trade show. It means were likely to see plenty of product announcements, as well as showcases t… [+14123 chars]

articles.title: Southampton: Boys who smoke risk passing on damaged genes - BBC
articles.description: Their children risk developing obesity and lung problems, say University of Southampton scientists.
articles.content:
Boys who smoke in their early teens risk passing on damaged genes to their own children, new research has found.

articles.title: Gabon coup leaders name General Brice Oligui Nguema as new leader - BBC
articles.description: Brice Oligui Nguema is named transitional leader after the overthrow of President Ali Bongo.
articles.content:
Army officers who seized power in a coup in Gabon on Wednesday have named General Brice Oligui Nguema as the West African state's transitional leader.
